name: Blocks for the Block Lord
description:
You are the Blocklord, Perfect and 32, yet these stupid horn-blowing Crusaders can't seem to understand that you are not to be trifled with. Trifle back!

  • Baddie blasting mouse and keyboard twitch action.
  • Thoughtful puzzle based block placement with a panicked time limit.
  • Place powerful turrets that do all the work for you!
  • Leaderboards powered by Dreamlo!
  • DOOT.
  • Made for Ludum Dare 39.
